home.twitelo-description-l1: Link your twitter account and your favorite online games!
home.twitelo-description-l2: Display your ranks, stats, and more in your twitter profile. Updated automatically!

description-example.l1: Speedrunner, Streamer & YouTuber passionate about video games.
description-example.l4: on twitch, sunday and monday night!

builder.select-game-to-add-account: Select a game to add account
builder.no-accounts: You need at least one account.
builder.can-move-anywhere: Once created, you can move your data anywhere in your profile.
builder.remove-tag-confirmation-message: Are you sure you want to delete this data?
builder.remove-account-confirmation-message: Are you sure you want to delete this account and all related data?
builder.cant-add-more-account: You can not add more accounts for this game
builder.account-rate-limit: You have added or edited too many accounts, please wait 1 minute
builder.profil-warn-data-example: - Your profile can contain sample values during the first hour.
builder.profil-warn-data-update: - Updating the data can take between 1 and 10 minutes depending on the games.
builder.refresh-preview: Click here to refresh the preview
builder.profile-first-save:
You saved your profile for the first time.

The updater has been activated automatically for your name, location and description (You can disable it from the settings or directly from the editor).

popup-delete-account.deleting-account-message: Are you sure you want to delete your account? This action cannot be undone.

pp.switch-profile-picture: Enable automatic changes to the profile picture based on triggers

notifications.send-mp-notifs: Send notifications in private messages twitter
notifications.send-mp-notifs-tooltip: You must follow @TwiteloFR or have private messages open

error.page-not-found: This page could not be found.
error.login-error-text: Please try again or contact an administrator.
